diseases.remedy: Indian aloe and hot medicines historically used; supportive rest and diet
diseases.method: Inhalation, topical or internal hot medicines as historically cited; use supportive diet and rest
diseases.dose: Traditional remedies not always quantified; follow narrative instructions or consult professional
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — mentions in pleurisy sections
diseases.remedy_description: Costus root (Indian aloe/Qust) appears as woody brown roots with an earthy-bitter taste; often used with warming preparations. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Costus

diseases.method: Take honey in warm water to ease expectoration and soothe throat
diseases.dose: 1–2 tbsp honey in warm water per cup; repeat as needed
diseases.timing: As needed; often morning or on empty stomach for effect
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — honey references
diseases.remedy_description: Warm drinks sweetened with honey are aromatic, soothing, and slightly viscous, commonly used to ease coughs and digestive discomfort. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Honey
